sources.title: Terry and the Pirates (1940) 15-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 15-chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: William Tracy, Jeff York, Joyce Bryant, Sheila Darcy
Director: James W. Horne

In the remote jungles of the Far East, Terry and his pals team up with the mysterious Dragon Lady to rescue his archeologist father from the clutches of the warlord Master Fang and his Leopard Men!

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00      PizzaFLIX Intro
01:04     CHAPTER 1:  Into the Great Unknown
30:43     CHAPTER 2:  The Fang Strikes
52:15     CHAPTER 3:  The Mountain of Death
1:10:27  CHAPTER 4:  The Dragon Queen Threatens
1:27:23  CHAPTER 5:  At the Mercy of the Mob
1:44:55  CHAPTER 6:  The Scroll of Wealth
2:03:55  CHAPTER 7:  Angry Waters
2:21:16  CHAPTER 8:  The Tomb of Peril
2:39:24  CHAPTER 9:  Jungle Hurricane
2:56:11  CHAPTER 10: Too Many Enemies
3:13:34  CHAPTER 11: Walls of Doom
3:30:42  CHAPTER 12: No Escape
3:49:06  CHAPTER 13: The Fatal Mistake
4:06:26  CHAPTER 14:  Pyre of Death
4:23:12  CHAPTER 15:  The Secret of the Temple
4:40:27  Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: Dr. Herbert Lee (John Paul Jones), an archaeologist seeking to decipher ancient Mara inscriptions, is aided by his son, Terry (William Tracy), and Terry's pal, Pat Ryan (Jeff York), and Normandie Drake (Joyce Bryant). Fang (Dick Curtis), a jungle pirate and warlord, plots to kill The Dragon Lady (Sheila Darcy), Queen of the Temple of Mara, and seize the treasures of her ancestors. Both Fang and The Dragon Lady have sworn death to any foreign intruders.
metadata.Writer: Milton Caniff, Mark Layton, George Morgan
metadata.Actors: William Tracy, Jeff York, Joyce Bryant
